ability.name: Everyone Loves a Parade
ability.description: * Place any card on Everyone Loves a Parade. * Once a card has been played on Everyone Loves a Parade, the next card must be either one higher than the highest card on Everyone Loves a Parade, or one lower than the lowest card on Everyone Loves a Parade. * When there are 3 cards on Everyone Loves a Parade: * every Adversary is forced to redraw the Intent that they would execute this turn. * discard all cards on Everyone Loves a Parade.
